org.purewidgets.client.im.json
Class WidgetOptionJson

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      org.purewidgets.client.json.GenericJson
          org.purewidgets.client.im.json.WidgetOptionJson

public class WidgetOptionJson
extends GenericJson

WidgetOptionJson is a Json DTO for receiving and sending a widget option to the interaction manager server.

Author:
"Jorge C. S. Cardoso"
See Also:
WidgetOption
